mapper.select: select count(user_id) cnt from user where user_id =#{user_id};
mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_phone_num, user_email, user_zipcode, user_addr, user_detailaddr, user_gender) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone_num}, #{user_email}, #{user_zipcode}, #{user_addr}, #{user_detailaddr}, #{user_gender})
